English: Informs all party members of the party leader's location.
Dutch: Informeerd alle partij leden van de locatie van de partij leider.

English: The party leader orders party members to attack a target.
Dutch: Partij leider beveelt de partij leden om een doel aan te vallen.

English: The party leader orders all party members to retreat.
Dutch: Partij leider beveelt alle partij leden om terug te vallen.

English: Increases the Critical Chance of the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% per party member.
Dutch: Increases the Critical Chance of the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% per party member.

English: Each party member around the leader increases the party leader's damage by 5%.
Dutch: Elk partij lid in de buurt van de partij leider voegt 5% bonus aanval toe aan de schade van de partij leider.

English: Increases the chance for Masquerpets to drop unique items.
Dutch: Verhoogt de kans dat monsters uniekere items droppen.

English: Party members recover 1.5 times faster. If the party leader is an Assist, party members recover 1.8 times faster.
Dutch: Partij leden herstellen 1.5 keer sneller. Als de partij leider een Assist is, dan herstellen de leden 1.8 keer sneller.

English: Increases the number of items dropped by Masquerpets.
Dutch: Verhoogt het aantal items dat gedropt wordt door monsters.

English: Each party member gains a 2.5% damage bonus for every party member nearby. This does not apply to the leader if Linked Attack is active.
Dutch: Each party member gains a 2.5% damage bonus for every party member nearby. This does not apply to the leader if Linked Attack is active.
